The y-axis represents velocity (v) in meters per second (m/s).

premise: From 0 to 10 seconds, the velocity increases from 0 m/s to 20 m/s.
conclusion: This indicates that the skydiver is accelerating during this interval.

conclusion: A positive acceleration in the context of this graph means the skydiver is accelerating downward.
